text:
I would like to see an option in the configuration files to fully remove product
and version information from the server headers ("Server: ...").

It is part of my security concept to NOT show anything like that to outside users.
creator: floeff@arcor.de
nd@perlig.de
text:
This issue was discussed several times on dev@httpd.apache.org and users@. It
won't be fixed. If it's part of your concept of "security", you need to patch
the code.
